name: disparately
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in very different ways: She's part of a team of six disparately aged individuals. Certain employment practices disparately impact on particular groups.
More examplesFewer examplesWe should treat similar cases similarly, not disparately. The server receives data in the form of disparately formatted instructions.The regenerated areas are disparately scattered across the city.The school was accused of disciplining girls and boys disparately. Their arguments were disparately based on the varying domestic conditions of their respective countries.
